articles.description: BTC ETFs: +$44m, ETH ETFs: -$133m. ETH falls as Grayscale ETF outflows continue. ETH ETFs still see $1bn of daily volume. Liquidations hit $250m in sell-off. ETH Open Interest hits ATH at CME. BTC whales have bought $23bn in July. SOL weekly active addresses hits ATH. Bitstamp to distribute Mt. Gox BTC today. Russia to legalise crypto mining & payments. Lummis set to introduce BTC strategic reserve bill. Harris will not be at Bitcoin Nashville. BTC going to $52m by 2050: VanEck. Hashdex file for mixed BTC & ETH ETF. Coinbase to make tokenised treasuries fund. Polymarket partners with Moonpay for on-ramp. Ferrari accepts crypto in Europe. Bitfarms stopped in poison-pill strategy. Riot buys another miner for $93m.

articles.description: BTC ETFs: -$78m, ETH ETFs: +$107m. BTC falls amid ETF outflows & Mt. Gox movements. ETH ETFs see ‘very solid’ first day $107m inflows. Grayscale ETH trust sees $484m outflow. ETH ETF volumes come out at 23% of BTC. Debate about whether strong flows will continue. SOL DEX volume continues to rise above ETH. Harris may also speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Harris could be far more open to Bitcoin: Cuban. BTC symbol lights up Vegas Sphere. Coinbase continues to pursue Gensler emails. dYdX explores sale of derivatives tech. dYdX site recovers after DNS attack. JD to create Hong Kong stablecoin. Bitwise uses ENS addresses for ETH ETFs. BlackRock applies for ENA cash allocation. Uber CEO wants to accept BTC.

Mt Gox moves $2.8bn BTC for distributions. US government moves $4m BTC to Coinbase. Bedford FC buys $4.5m BTC. Hamilton Lane launches private credit fund on SOL. CNBC discusses BTC reserve currency rumour. Polymarket sets another trading record. BlockFi administrator submits plan to repay customers. WLD denies insider trading and manipulation claims. India keeps high crypto taxes unchanged. Gate exchange exits Japan. Marathon Digital fined $138m for breaching NDA. HyperLend launches lending on HyperLiquid.

Germany already lost $124m profit selling.

It appears that people very often invest in meme coins that are very obviously going to rug pull. Once it happens, they just laugh it off on Twitter, is being scammed fun?!

articles.description:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.

In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.
articles.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token

Listed both  
on Wall Street and the London Stock Exchange (LSE) Bitcoin miner Argo  
Blockchain, has announced a £6.5 million private placement agreement with an  
institutional investor. The deal involves the issuance of 57,800,000 ordinary  
shares at £0.1125 per share on the LSE, along with warrants to purchase an  
additional 57,800,000 shares at the same price.
Argo Blockchain Secures  
£6.5 Million in Private Placement Deal
The  
placement price represents a premium to Argo's recent trading averages and a  
10% discount to the closing price on July 29. H.C. Wainwright & Co. is  
serving as the exclusive placement agent for the transaction.
Argo plans  
to use the net proceeds for working capital, general corporate purposes, and  
debt repayment. The company expects the placement sha…
articles.title: Wall Street Bitcoin Miner Taps Institutional Investor for £6.5 Million Capital Boost

articles.author: Amitoj Singh
articles.description: The U.S. SEC may be dropping it's charges against so-called third-party tokens such as Solana and Matic which have been part of its case against Binance, according to a court filing early Tuesday morning.
articles.title: SEC Intends to Amend Complaint Against Third Party Tokens (Like SOL) in Binance Case

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: The Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) of Hong Kong has issued a public warning regarding Proxinex, an entity suspected of virtual asset-related fraud. Investors have encountered issues withdrawing virtual assets from Proxinex, later being informed that their accounts were nonexistent. The SFC suspects Proxinex enlisted an agent to attract investors through dating apps, possibly using […]
articles.title: Hong Kong Regulator Warns Against Proxinex for Suspected Virtual Asset Fraud

articles.author: Shaurya Malwa
articles.description: “It’s going to be extremely volatile this week, so I will not be surprised to see BTC price get another 10% drop/pump,” one analyst noted.
articles.title: Bitcoin Slides to $66K in Wake of Silk Road BTC Movements, Solana’s SOL Leads Majors Losses

articles.author: Jake Simmons
articles.description:
In a potentially highly politically charged move, the US. Democratic government orchestrated the transfer of 29,800 Bitcoin, valued at approximately $2 billion, to a newly created address on Monday. This development, first identified by the crypto intelligence platform Arkham, not only stunned the market but also sparked significant speculation and debate among the industry.
 
Arkham’s report detailed that this large sum of Bitcoin was split into two separate addresses: 10,000 BTC now residing in bc1qlap8 and 19,800 BTC in bc1qngy. Analysts at Arkham believe the 10,000 BTC represents a deposit to an institutional custody or service, signaling a potential preparation for sale.
 
These transactions occurred shortly after the former US President and current presidential candidate Donald Trump…
articles.title: Dems Could Sell Off All Bitcoin To Thwart Trump’s ‘Stockpile’ Plans: Experts

articles.author: Guest Author
articles.description: This piece is a guest post by Blocmates. Blocmates is an invaluable crypto news and educational resource that offers clarity in the often complicated and jargon-filled crypto space. In this article, writer Dexter of Blocmates explains Avalanche’s exciting forthcoming update, Avalanche Community Proposal 77. To do so, Dexter gives an overview of Avalanche’s unique architecture. […]
articles.title: An Avalanche Reawakening

articles.author: Ronaldo Marquez
articles.description:
One of the world’s largest financial powerhouses, Cantor Fitzgerald, which boasts a $13.2 billion valuation, is poised to make a significant entry into the crypto market, as the firm recently unveiled plans to delve into Bitcoin-backed lending on a grand scale. 
 
According to the firm’s announcement, the strategic move involves the launch of a specialized Bitcoin financing business aimed at providing leverage to investors who are holding Bitcoin, marking a substantial step towards integrating traditional finance with the digital asset landscape.
 
Cantor Fitzgerald Commits To BTC Support
 
With a substantial initial financing injection of $2 billion, the firm envisions substantial growth for this venture in the near future, underlining a strong commitment to expanding its presence in the …
articles.title: Cantor Fitzgerald Eyes Major Bitcoin Financing Business, $2B Initial Capital To Fuel Growth

articles.author: Terence Zimwara
articles.description: A group of four Hong Kong fraudsters, who swindled victims’ digital assets worth $1.4 million between October 2023 and July 2024, have been apprehended. The suspects, aged 14 to 39, are charged with conspiracy to defraud and possession of 5,000 counterfeit banknotes. According to Hong Kong laws, producing and circulating counterfeit currency can result in […]
articles.title: Hong Kong Police Arrest Quartet Accused of Using Counterfeit Banknotes to Swindle Crypto Traders

articles.author: Samuel Edyme
articles.description:
The dark and more ominous side of the crypto world was on display again this week when a 29-year-old foreign national became an unwitting victim in one of Kyiv, Ukraine’s brutal crimes.
 
This incident sheds light on the risks associated with cryptocurrency holdings and exposes the severe consequences of theft in this digital age.
 
 
A Tragic Abduction and Theft
 
The victim, a young enthusiast in the field of cryptocurrency, was tragically kidnapped and subsequently murdered by a group of four men.
 
The suspects, aged 24 to 29 years old, planned their attack in detail and assaulted the victim for his digital wallet containing 3 BTC worth around $200,000 at the time of the crime.
 
According to the report from the National Police of Ukraine, the kidnappers had been planning the abduction…
articles.title: Tragic End for Bitcoin Holder: Young Crypto Investor Murdered After Robbery in Kyiv

articles.author: Sergio Goschenko
articles.description: A survey conducted by Binance revealed that more than half of all cryptocurrency users in Latin America utilize crypto as a long-term investment, choosing to hold onto their digital assets. The survey, which polled 10,000 users from Argentina, Brazil, Colombia, and Mexico, indicates that the number of users in this group exceeds the number of […]
articles.title: Binance Survey: Half of All Latin American Crypto Users Treat It as a Long-Term Investment

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: The U.S. national debt has exceeded $35 trillion, highlighting the country’s severe fiscal challenges as debates over taxes and spending continue. The Congressional Budget Office forecasts the debt could surpass $56 trillion by 2034, driven by rising expenditures and interest costs outpacing tax revenues. High interest rates, unexpected pandemic-related program costs, and robust demand for […]
articles.title: US Debt Crisis Deepens as National Debt Surpasses $35 Trillion

articles.author: Ronaldo Marquez
articles.description:
In a recent move, the asset managers behind the ARK Bitcoin ETF (ARKB), 21Shares and Ark Investment, have announced a partnership with the decentralized oracle network Chainlink to set a “new standard” for transparency and security in the world of tokenized assets.
 
Chainlink’s PoR To Verify ARKB Bitcoin ETF Reserves
 
As announced on Monday, the driver behind this integration is the adoption of Chainlink’s Proof of Reserve (PoR) solution, which is said to provide a secure and transparent way to verify the underlying Bitcoin reserves backing the ARKB ETF. 
 
 
The asset managers, together with the Chainlink network, announced that by tapping directly into Coinbase’s data feeds, Chainlink’s PoR can automatically update the on-chain reference contract with the total value of ARKB’s Bitcoin …
articles.title: Bitcoin ETF Transformation: ARK/21Shares Integrates Chainlink’s PoR For Major Update

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: The CEO of Indian crypto exchange Coindcx has criticized Wazirx’s approach in response to a recent $230 million cyberattack. Urging Wazirx to take responsibility, he stressed: “Making customers directly absorb the 45% losses is utter nonsense.” Wazirx is working to recover and reopen its platform, providing updates and taking legal actions, while assuring users about […]
articles.title: Coindcx Urges Wazirx to Reconsider Passing 45% Losses to Customers

articles.author: Keshav Verma
articles.description:
Data shows that the sentiment among Bitcoin investors is close to entering extreme greed territory. Here’s what this could imply for the market.
 
Bitcoin Fear & Greed Index Is Right On Edge Of Extreme Greed
 
The “Fear & Greed Index” is an indicator created by Alternative that tells us about the general sentiment among the investors in the Bitcoin and wider cryptocurrency market.
 
 
This index uses five factors to determine this average sentiment: volatility, trading volume, market cap dominance, social media sentiment, and Google Trends.
 
The indicator represents this sentiment using a numeric scale from zero to a hundred. All values above 53 reflect the presence of greed in the market, while those under 47 imply fear among the investors. The region between these two territories corres…
articles.title: Bitcoin On Verge Of Extreme Greed: What This Means For Price
